title: Verizon Fios Latency
body: So I have 40 down and my connection to my server is <1 ms. My problem comes only in game when I experience high ping spikes. I've noticed that other people have had this issue but I have yet to see a solution. Does anyone have any suggestions?

replies.body:
Latency issues are most commonly caused by routing issues to the server. Before we take a look at your route, I recommend checking your local settings by working through our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your latency.
